description: As a customer i want to manage orders on the customer portal
name: Customer should be able to manage order

elements.name: Customer clicks magic link after 24 hours and Verify the Bookings Section

steps.name: I have created an order as a customer
I get the previous order Order ID
I click the "Manage Bookings" button in my email after 24 hours
I should see "Bookings" as a header in the page that loads
I should see "Ticket Price", "Reservation" and "Total:" sections under Bookings
I should not see The Edit button on the Page
I should see the "More Actions" dropdown with "Download Tickets" option
I should see that the QrCode is "Not Redeemed" with "rgb(97, 189, 63)" Background color

steps.name: I get the previous order Order ID
I click the "Manage Bookings" button in my email after 24 hours
I should see "Order Information" as a header in the page that loads
I should see "Order Details", "Contact Details" and "Billing Details" Accordions
I should not see The Edit button on the Page
I should see the "More Actions" dropdown with "Download Tickets" option
I should see that the QrCode is "Not Redeemed" with "rgb(97, 189, 63)" Background color
I click "Order Details" dropdown
The "Order Details" section displays data consistent with the order created
I click "Contact Details" dropdown
The "Contact Details" section displays data consistent with the order created

steps.name: I get the previous order Order ID
I click the "Manage Bookings" button in my email after 24 hours for order "ULOQIBOXHJM33"
The magic link takes the customer to the "Request a magic link" page
The order reference 'ULOQIBOXHJM33' is pre-populated
the 'Request magic link' button is clicked
I should see 'Magic link sent' header in the page that loads
I should see body text with 'A new magic link has been sent to your email.' in the page that loads
I get the previous order Order ID
I click the "Manage Bookings" button in my email after 24 hours for order "ULOQIBOXHJM33"

steps.name: I get the previous order Order ID
I click the "Manage Bookings" button in my email after 24 hours
I should see "Order Information" as a header in the page that loads
I click the "Edit Order" button
I should be taken to "Amending Booking" page
I should see "From,To,Who,when" sections
I should see "Available Options" card which should contain "Previous Day" and "Next Day"
I click the Edit Order Button beside More Actions dropdown
I edit the 'Who' section by removing '1x Adult'
I should no longer see the "Reservation" Seating Compartments section
I click the "Discard edits and return to order" button to return to the Order Page
I click the Edit Order Button beside More Actions dropdown
I edit the 'Date' section by clicking the 'Previous Day' button
I should no longer see the "Reservation" Seating Compartments section
I click the "Discard edits and return to order" button to return to the Order Page
I click the Edit Order Button beside More Actions dropdown
I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
